glissando.config.group.colors.desc: Options to control the usage of colors inside the note block GUI.
glissando.config.group.colors.name: Colors
glissando.config.group.config_button.des: Options to control the visual appearance of the config button.
glissando.config.group.inputs.desc: Options to control the valid input methods.
glissando.config.group.inputs.name: Inputs
glissando.config.group.screen.desc: Options to control the behaviors of the note block GUI.
glissando.config.group.screen.name: Screen
glissando.config.group.tooltips.desc: Options to control the visual appearance of note key tooltips.
glissando.config.group.tooltips.name: Tooltips
glissando.config.option.background_end_c: The bottom color of the gradient in the note block GUI.
glissando.config.option.background_start: The top color of the gradient in the note block GUI.
glissando.config.option.config_button.de: Creates a button to bring up this screen from inside the note block GUI.
glissando.config.option.config_button_po: The alignment of the config button relative to the "Done" button.
glissando.config.option.interaction_mode: Note sounds are played on the client side, synchronizing them better with key presses. Other players will not be able to hear your inputs until the note block is tuned, which will happen when you close the GUI.
Like reclusive mode, note sounds are played on the client side. However, the note block will be tuned to the new value completely inaudibly when the GUI is closed.
Note sounds are played through the note block, losing some synchronization in favor of allowing other players to hear your inputs.
glissando.config.option.keybind_inputs.d: Note keys can be played "remotely" using your computer keyboard.
glissando.config.option.keybind_tooltips: Tooltip text indicates the key on your computer keyboard required to play the hovered-over note key.
glissando.config.option.keyboard_color_p: Note keys will always tint based on their pitches.
Note keys will tint based on their pitches but only when they're being pressed.
glissando.config.option.mouse_inputs.des: Note keys can be played directly by clicking on them with your mouse cursor.
glissando.config.option.note_tooltips.de: Tooltip text indicates the note of the hovered-over note key.
glissando.config.option.open_screen_on_p: The note block GUI will automatically open when the note block is placed down.
glissando.config.option.open_screen_pred: The note block GUI will always open regardless of circumstance.
The note block GUI will never open.
The note block GUI will only open when it can actually be tuned, failing when it has a mob head or block above.
glissando.config.option.pitch_tooltips.d: Tooltip text indicates the pitch of the hovered-over hovered-over note key, as determined by the note block's "note" block state property.
glissando.config.option.preview_gui.desc: Test the changes you've made by taking a peek at the note block GUI!
glissando.config.option.preview_gui.name: Preview GUI
glissando.config.option.title_colors.des: The screen title text will dynamically tint based on the pitches of the notes you play.
glissando.config.option.tooltip_colors.d: Tooltip text will tint based on the pitch of the note.
glissando.config.title: Glissando
glissando.note_block_screen.title: Tune Note Block
resourcePack.glissando:32x_upscale.name: Glissando: 32x Upscale
